org.wildfly.swarm.config

Class ManagementCoreService<T extends ManagementCoreService<T>>

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.AbstractMap<K,V>
      • java.util.HashMap
        • org.wildfly.swarm.config.ManagementCoreService<T>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, Cloneable, Map
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ManagementFraction

    public class ManagementCoreService<T extends ManagementCoreService<T>>
extends HashMap
    The management services used to control a server or a host's host controller.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
